entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuarapik Airport 6:21 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.2°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
